thread.title: Texas governor prematurely congratulates Astros on ALDS win
thread.title_full: Texas governor prematurely congratulates Astros on ALDS win - CBSSports.com

author: Matt Snyder
title: Texas governor prematurely congratulates Astros on ALDS win
text:
The Houston Astros lost a heartbreaker to the Kansas City Royals in Game 4 of the ALDS on Monday. They had a 6-2 lead through seven innings, but the Royals ended up winning 9-6.
Before the Royals' furious comeback, Texas governor Greg Abbott tweeted his congratulations to the Astros on winning the series while noting that the Rangers could make it an all-Texas ALCS.
Not surprisingly, the tweet has since been deleted, but it's the Internet, which means everything lives forever. Here's someone who screen-grabbed it:
Everyone blame Greg Abbott. pic.twitter.com/bFQTTio0lt 
â€” Cassie Logan (@c4ssielogan) October 12, 2015 The governor jinx!
The Astros will have their shot at making Governor Abbott look like a prophet in Game 5 on Wednesday. Until then, the entire city of Houston has to have a pretty awful taste in its mouth.
Topics: Houston Astros , Kansas City Royals , MLB
